name: SELF_Return
description:
The plot tells about a man who suffers from amnesia, but with all his might tries not to forget the main thing - revenge.

Estimated time to complete the game: <10 minutes.

Controls:
A, D - Move left, right
W, Space - Jump
LMB - shoot
Esc - InGame menu

Hints:
Use recochet, bullet recochet 0 to 2 times
The end of the level is always on the right

Source Unity Project:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XgJAnGJqfDhBRh0x8rgeeHoaOv9nTS96/view?usp=shari...

Using assets:
Music and Sound Effects: http://zvukipro.com
Pistol_3D: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/sci-fi-pistol-c23394d709d14772adf355da84408edc
Act_5_Room: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/investigator-office-colored-version-30c4d5b34020...
Player_3D:  reskined composite model of models from:  https://p3dm.ru/files/characters/human/
Textures Act_1-Act_4: from Quixel Bridge
Player_Animations: mixamo.com
